Good day! Welcome to the interpretation module. 

Before we begin, we will explain the steps the user must take to complete the interpretation process. 

Step 1. Select from one of the buttons below 
--- Choosing CAMERA will open the camera, please take a picture of the Nutrition Facts label 
--- Choosing GALLERY will open the gallery, please select a picture of the Nutrition Facts label 

Step 2. Crop the picture taken or selected to show the Nutrition Facts label only 

Step 3. (Optional) Confirm the data found in the Nutrition Facts label selected.

Good day! Welcome to the allergen detection module. 

Before we begin, we will explain the steps the user must take to complete the allergen detection process. 

Step 1. Select from one of the buttons below 
--- Choosing CAMERA will open the camera, please take a picture of the ingredients 
--- Choosing GALLERY will open the gallery, please select a picture of the ingredients 

Step 2. Crop the picture taken or selected to show the ingredients area only 

Step 3. (Optional) Confirm the data found in the ingredients selected.
